helloagin:
Nice to see you again 😊 
Choose MIB Services 👇🏻
phoneRegText: To complete the list, enter a phone number (e.g. +998901234567) or click the button below 📞
errphoneRegText: Phone number not found 😓 Please enter a phone number ✍🏻
registrationErrorPhoneText: Please enter a valid phone number
SetDistrict: For information, select a region or city from the list 👇🏻
chooseCityOrDistrict: Select a county or city to apply 👇🏻
passsportSendText:
Enter passport data 
Passport series (in Latin letters) and number: 
(Example: AA000000)
phoneSendText:
Enter a phone number to contact or press the send number button 
 (example: +998901234567)
